title: Light Crossbows
content: Light Crossbows in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Light Crossbows are Two-Handed Simple Weapons in BG3 that can only be two-handed, dealing 1-8 Damage without enchantments, the exception being the Makeshift Crossbow that deals 1-4 damage instead.
